text: Louis Eugene Jagnow (July 31, 1910 – March 26, 2007) was an American professional basketball player. He played in the National Basketball League for the Detroit Eagles in two games during the 1939–40 season. ==References== Category:1910 births Category:2007 deaths Category:American men's basketball players Category:Basketball players from Michigan Category:Carnegie Mellon Tartans baseball players Category:Carnegie Mellon Tartans men's basketball players Category:Detroit Eagles players Category:Guards (basketball) Category:Sportspeople from Jackson, Michigan
title: Lou Jagnow
